These weapons were multi-barreled Stubbers, using electric motors to maintain an extremely high rate of fire from their spinning barrel. Their medium caliber slugs lacked the power of Bolter shells, but nonetheless the sheer volume of them proved effective against unarmored hordes of foes and fleshy Xenos. Originally used by the Imperial Army and the Space Marine Legions, it is still occasionally found within the Imperial Navy and the shoulders of Myrmidons.
